LightningComponentBundle.description: Created by: Tristan Nohrer: This is to be used in a screen flow to call icons from the salesforce design library.

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name
property.description: See lightning-icon developer guide. Format as 'category:icon_name' ex: utility:activity. For more info google SLDS icon library

property.name: size
property.label: Size
property.description: See lightning-icon developer guide. Otherwise enter: small, medium, x-small, xx-small, large

property.name: variant
property.label: Variant
property.description: See lightning-icon developer guide. Enter: inverse, success, error, warning
